alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 6:20PM PST until March 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
